dataset.description: Point features representing water valves along water network include such types as gate, butterfly, air and check valves. Valves are used to regulate the flow of water or to release air from pipes in the water network.

dataset.description: Water features and structures identified include: wells, PRV’s, sampling stations, treatment plants, pump stations, chamber sand reservoirs.
dataset.title: Water Structures - CAD

dataset.title: Water Pipes - CAD

dataset.description: Water system features such as junctions, caps, tees, reducers, pressure backflow, crosses or blow-offs between pipe segments along water network
dataset.title: Water Nodes - CAD

dataset.description: These are point locations displayed indicating fire hydrant in the Township. Hydrants supply large volume of water to aid fire fighters.

dataset.description: Manhole types include: regular, forced, cleanout, terminal and sumps that are placed along sewer mains to allow access to inspect and routinely clean pipes along sanitary network

dataset.description: Property lines mapped as parcel polygons within Langley Township. The data includes the following attribute information: folio, PID, and civic address. The legal base is of varying accuracy because there is a mixture of old lots that have never been formally surveyed, new lots from high accuracy “digital submissions” and many others that fall somewhere between.
dataset.title: Parcels - CAD

dataset.description: The boundary extents of Langley Township’s legal jurisdiction.
dataset.title: Municipal Boundary - CAD

dataset.description: This data provides the locations of civic, crown, emergency and private facilities in the Township of Langley. Facilities are used corporately as both primary and background data. Civic and crown facilities are frequently updated but private facilities may not be accurate. Facility data is not intended as a true legal representation, it has been compiled from a variety of sources over many decades, using differing standards for measurement, input and documentation.
dataset.title: Facilities - CAD

dataset.description: Drainage storm sewer system inlets and catch basins
dataset.title: Drainage Sources - CAD

dataset.description: Drainage pump stations. These are utility flow structure that aids in maintaining flow and transport of storm water et al along drainage mains.
dataset.title: Drainage Pump Stations - CAD

dataset.description: Drainage storm sewer system features that intersect at breakpoints along drainage main include junctions, outlets or caps.
dataset.title: Drainage Nodes - CAD

dataset.description: Point features representing various structure locations along drainage network that allow access to chambers and pipes for maintenance and inspection. Various types of drainage manholes include: sumps, standard, cleanout, risers, controlled, catch basins, sediment control, oil and grit interceptors, box, rockpits and perforated.
dataset.title: Drainage Manholes - CAD

dataset.description: Dykes are built up for flood protection such case as periods of raised water levels from snow melt or possible high tide events.
dataset.title: Drainage Dykes - CAD

dataset.description: Drainage storm sewer system detention ponds
dataset.title: Drainage Detention Ponds - CAD

dataset.description: Drainage sewer system culverts.
dataset.title: Drainage Culverts - CAD

dataset.description: Linear pipes representing lateral connections from property boundary to Township drainage pipes in the drainage network.
dataset.title: Drainage Connections - CAD

dataset.description: Linear features are surficial, natural and man made waterways to direct surface drainage.
dataset.title: Drainage Channels - CAD

dataset.description: 1 meter contour intervals derived from the most recent DEM data obtained by the Township of Langley.
dataset.title: Contours - CAD

dataset.description: Municipal properties reserved for the protection of the natural environment.
dataset.title: Conservation Areas - CAD

dataset.description: Boundaries of each community in the Township of Langley as defined by the community plans.
dataset.title: Communities - CAD

dataset.description: Polygon outlines for identifying property boundary of each cemetery.
dataset.title: Cemeteries - CAD

dataset.description: Agricultural land reserve boundaries are used to identify lands areas that are within the Agricultural Land Reserve. The ALR is a Provincial designation monitored by the Agricultural Land Commission (ALC).
dataset.title: Agricultural Land Reserve - CAD

dataset.description:
Total, Industrial product price index (IPPI) (index, 2010=100) Statistics Canada table 329-0074.
Total, Raw materials price indexes (RMPI) (index, 2010=100) Statistics Canada table 330-0008.
North American Product Classification System (NAPCS).
dataset.title: Indexes IPPI, RMPI
